author: leeederek
content: Hey! Wanted to cross-post this to the el-testing channel. We're from Offchain Labs and wanted to flag this in case others hit similar issues. For the time being, we're going to ask Arbitrum node operators to use a different EL client for their L1 RPC connection ahead of Oct 14 - thanks!
